sentences.english: The country is ruled by a group of army officers.
sentences.chinese: 這位軍官今天上午派遣了一個團的兵力。

sentences.english: registration with the people's armed forces departments at the county level.
sentences.chinese: 縣人民武裝部辦理預備役軍官登記。

sentences.english: The results of the appraisal shall be taken as the main basis for appointing or removing reserve officers.
sentences.chinese: 考覈結果作爲任免預備役軍官職務的主要依據。

sentences.english: Such an act of cowardice by an officer shames his whole regiment.
sentences.chinese: 一個軍官作出如此膽怯的行爲使整個團都蒙受羞辱。

sentences.english: The training of Air Defence Battalion’s officers and non-commissioned officers will be started in September, using the delivered equipment.
sentences.chinese: 9月份，將開始對防空營的軍官士兵進行訓練。

sentences.english: One of our promising young officers has begun his training in the Spartan Agoge.
sentences.chinese: 我們有前途的年輕軍官，他一開始在斯巴達教育培訓。

sentences.english: One evening she met Captain Humphreys at a dance.
sentences.chinese: 一天晚上她在舞會上遇到了軍官漢弗雷斯。

sentences.english: The officer detached a regiment this morning.
sentences.chinese: 這位軍官今天上午派遣了一個團的兵力。

sentences.english: He is an officer in the cavalry.
Significantly, this leakage includes a large share of high-performing officers.
sentences.chinese: 值得關注的是，這種外流很大一部分是能力強的軍官。

sentences.english: They can also be invaluable in creating a well versed cadre of NCOs and Officers.
sentences.chinese: 這樣打造出精通熟練的士官和軍官幹部是非常寶貴的。

sentences.english: The officer bellowed (out) a command to his men.
sentences.chinese: 軍官叫嚷着對士兵下命令。

sentences.english: Pillai is educated and married to an officer in the Indian Air Force.
sentences.chinese: 皮拉伊受過教育，嫁給了印度空軍的一名軍官。

sentences.english: The officer commanded his men to retreat into the castle.
sentences.chinese: 軍官命令手下撤到城堡裏去。

sentences.english: The officer undid the flap of his holster and drew his gun.
sentences.chinese: 軍官打開槍套蓋拔出了手槍。

sentences.english: Newly trained female officers of the Afghan National Army sit at their graduation ceremony at the army's training center.
sentences.chinese: 軍隊培訓中心，女軍官在培訓結業典禮上。

definition: senior official/senior officer/commanding officer/CL:位[wei4]/sir (term of address for senior officer)
to serve in the army/to be a soldier
